helpCenter.title: Help Center
helpCenter.subtitle: Quickly access frequently asked questions or create a support request.
helpCenter.description: Our goal is to solve your problem as soon as possible.

whatIsTagsi.a: Tagsi is a shared ride platform that brings together passengers and drivers traveling in the same direction. It provides a technological infrastructure that enables users to share rides.

isTagsiTaxi.a: No. Tagsi is not a taxi application engaged in commercial passenger transportation. The platform only brings users together within the scope of shared rides and courtesy transportation.

howToCreateTripPassenger.q: How do I create a trip as a passenger?
howToCreateTripPassenger.a: Open the app, select your current location and the address you want to go to. When you are matched with suitable drivers, you can start your trip.

howToRegisterDriver.q: How do I register as a driver?
howToRegisterDriver.a:
By downloading the app and completing:
• Your personal information
• Vehicle information
• Required verification steps
your driver account becomes active.

howFeeDetermined.q: How is the trip fee determined?
howFeeDetermined.a:
For shared rides, Tagsi provides a recommended sharing amount based on distance and route information. This amount:
• Is mutually evaluated between the passenger and the driver before the trip
• Is not mandatory
• Is finalized with mutual consent of the parties
Tagsi is not a commercial platform that sets prices. The platform only provides an informative and guiding infrastructure.

howPaymentMade.a:
Shared ride payments take place directly between the passenger and the driver. Tagsi:
• Does not act as an intermediary for payments
• Does not take commission from trips
The platform only provides matching and communication infrastructure.

communication.q: How is communication handled during the trip?
communication.a:
Communication is carried out entirely through the app:
• In-app messaging
• In-app calling infrastructure
Secure and controlled communication is established without sharing phone numbers.

cancellation.q: What happens if I cancel the trip?
cancellation.a: Cancellations made before the trip starts are recorded by the system. In cases of frequent cancellations, temporary restrictions may be applied to account usage.

otherPartyCancellation.q: What happens if the other party cancels the trip?
otherPartyCancellation.a: Cancellations made by the passenger or the driver are recorded in the system. Restrictions may be applied to accounts that frequently cancel trips within the scope of platform rules.

petsAndRequests.q: How are pets or special requests managed?
petsAndRequests.a:
When communicating with the passenger through the app:
• Pets or special requests are shared
• Whether to accept these requests is entirely up to the other party's preference
Trip conditions are determined by mutual consent of the parties.

safety.a:
The Tagsi platform includes:
• Basic verification processes
• User rating and review system
• In-app registered communication infrastructure
The aim is to provide a safe and controlled travel experience.

ratingSystem.q: How does the rating system work?
ratingSystem.a: After each trip, users can rate each other. Ratings affect profile visibility and matching order.

activeCities.q: In which cities is Tagsi available?
activeCities.a: Tagsi is gradually expanding its service network. You can view the activity status in your city through the application.

isTagsiPaid.a: Downloading the application and basic usage are free. Details regarding platform services are stated within the application.

personalData.a: Yes. Tagsi applies necessary technical and administrative measures to protect user data. Communication and transaction information are managed through a secure infrastructure.

deleteAccount.q: How can I delete my account?
deleteAccount.a: You can create an account deletion request from the profile settings section. After the request, your account information will be removed from the system.
